Conan Wallet extension. Gateway to the Interchain & Dymension ecosystem & Conan ecosytem.
- Features:
 ● Deposit through QR code
 ● Send & IBC send
 ● Total value of assets stored across 50+ chains Cosmos and Evm network
 ● Transaction sign/ Auto sign
 ● Ledger integration
 ● Prioritize
